title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2169.1 - Access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2169.1 - Access to records

State Regulations

The corporation or its designated agent will have access to
all books, accounts, records, reports, files and other papers or property of
grantees or owners pertaining to funds provided under the act for the purpose
of making surveys, audits, examinations, excerpts and
transcripts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2169.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
